# add libraries
library("DESeq2")

# Read count matrix
countdata <- read.table("/data/.../counts.tsv", header=TRUE, check.names = TRUE)

# Read smaplesheet , detects conditions, generate the formula
sampleInfo <- read.table("/data/.../samplehseet.tsv", header=TRUE, check.names = TRUE, stringsAsFactor = F)
sampleInfo$genotype <- as.factor(sampleInfo$genotype)
sampleInfo$treatment <- as.factor(sampleInfo$treatment)
# build the matrix
d<-as.formula(~condition + treatment + condition:treatment)
dds <- DESeq2::DESeqDataSetFromMatrix(countData = countdata, colData = sampleInfo, design =d)

#estimate size factor
dds <- estimateSizeFactors(dds)

dds <- DESeq(dds)


# gene-wise dispersion
